author: Patricia T
comment: I downloaded this, it wasn't quite what I was expecting/wanted and now want my info/photos/email deleted. I've tried contacting thru the app and thru the developer email but no one has contacted back. I also think, since I signed up, that my email has been sold, as I'm suddenly getting spam emails that are not nice in nature. Please contact me to resolve. Thanks.

Thanks and have a nice day!
